stories.text:
I was unhappy with the fact that I couldn't bring my own database to Heroku Dataclips (which I otherwise love). I don't want a super complex feature set with a ton of confusing bells and whistles.

So I built QueryClips with the aim of getting the basics, done well.

Coupon code SOFTLAUNCH during checkout will get you a month free.

https://www.queryclips.com
stories.title: Show HN: QueryClips, Data sharing for savvy developers
EU energy groups prepare to meet Vladimir Putinâ€™s terms for Russian gas

stories.text:
I have been lurking HN for years, sometimes submitting articles yet very rarely engaging in comments. What stops me from commenting, and from reacting to other people's comments, is the fact that the chances of starting a conversation are so low (i.e. the person I am replying to may never know I wrote something, and if they somehow do reply I'm probably not going to see it unless I explicitly go back to check).

Is there anything I'm missing?
stories.title: Ask HN: How do HN pros keep track of responses to their comments?
